Subject: Re: More dodging and shooting

Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit
X-Mailer: Unknown sub 107
From: KSLawdogg@...

Unitron:




Unitron laughed as he ducked under the rockets and charges, which exploded 
several meters behind him, only helping to add onto the carnage of the once 
beautiful grasslands surrounding the Cybertronian Fire.  Now most of the area 
in front of the CF was burning grass and dirt-filled craters.

The top of Unitron's left wrist pulled up, revealing a small laser blaster 
embedded inside, the barrel pointing at Hot Rod.  Ten rapid blasts launched 
out at the Maximal (or Autobot..?)'s chest.  Unitron brought his laser rifle 
to point at Hot Rod at the same time, firing off three bolts at Hot Rod's 
left knee, followed up by five rapid optic blasts at the war hero's left 
shoulder.
